page.title: 17VILLAGE FARM HISTORY (1)
page.content: {Christmas Hill Farm}house is approximately{3OO years}old and was renovated in 1971 by its present owners Mr. and Mrs. Horne. They live in the farm with their three daughters while their son lives in Scotland. Mr. Horne is a{Chartered Surveyor}in Coventry. The origin of Christmas Hill name is unknown. There have been literary references made of it as far back as the{l6th century.} A short time ago the Horne family were given proof that two hundred years ago another family by the name of Horne lived and worked the farm. Their oldest son Richard married a girl without his father's consent and had four children. For some unknown reason Richard's father refused to have his wife, children or grandchildren living at{Christmas Hill
